definition: ancient weapon like a long solid metal truncheon
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: “Jian” normally denotes a long Chinese sword but Sha Shou Jian are blunt and heavy.
sentences.chinese: “锏”通常指中国长剑但是杀手锏钝而重。

sentences.english: This is the essential difference between mace and pontil .
sentences.chinese: 这是锏和铁棒的本质区别。

halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
